name: Once A Thief...
description:
You are a thief in the D&D city of Holdgard's Port. You work, like every thief in the guild, for Mama Lena. You didn't plan to do anything tonight, but all of a sudden you find yourself in a heist. 

Will you be able to open the safe door or will you end up in jail?

It's up to you and lady Luck.
